keyMoments.title: Unveils the Tokudai Candle Service Set
keyMoments.description: Mr. 3 reveals his elaborate torture device designed to slowly turn victims into wax statues, demonstrating the full creative and lethal potential of his Devil Fruit powers.
keyMoments.significance: Establishes Mr. 3 as a cunning and sadistic villain who views murder as artistic expression.
keyMoments.quote: You will become wax statues, forever preserving the terror on your faces as a morbid work of art!

keyMoments.title: Uses Candle Lock on Brogy
keyMoments.description: Mr. 3 immobilizes the giant warrior Brogy with massive wax shackles, showing his wax can restrain even opponents with enormous physical strength.
keyMoments.significance: Demonstrates the hardness and strength of solidified wax from the Doru Doru no Mi.

keyMoments.title: Reveals Manipulation of Giants' Duel
keyMoments.description: Mr. 3 admits to orchestrating the sabotage of Dorry's drink, revealing the extent of his deception and dishonorable tactics.
keyMoments.significance: Shows the contrast between Mr. 3's underhanded methods and the giants' honorable warrior code.
keyMoments.quote: Did you really think that explosion was an accident? I set up that entire scheme!

abilities.description: Creates a massive cake-shaped wax structure with burning candles that slowly coat victims in wax vapor, turning them into statues.
Creates large wax shackles to immobilize opponents, strong enough to restrain even giants.
An anime-original wax technique used in conjunction with his torture setup.

relationships.description: Mr. 3's partner in Baroque Works officer agent team.

reveals.information: Can create elaborate torture devices with his Doru Doru no Mi powers
Views his murders as artistic expression and takes sadistic pleasure in his victims' fear

keyMoments.title: Prepares to Cut Off His Own Legs
keyMoments.description: Faced with dying helplessly as a wax statue, Zoro decides to cut off his own legs to escape the trap, declaring that a warrior would rather be maimed than die pathetically.
keyMoments.significance: One of the most iconic moments showcasing Zoro's extreme dedication to his warrior code and absolute refusal to accept a helpless death.
keyMoments.quote: I refuse to die in such a stupid way! I'll cut off my own legs and fight my way free!

keyMoments.title: Earns Brogy's Respect
keyMoments.description: Brogy recognizes Zoro as a true warrior with the spirit of Elbaf, despite being enemies in circumstance.
keyMoments.significance: Establishes mutual respect between Zoro and the giants based on shared warrior values.

relationships.description: Brogy recognizes Zoro's warrior spirit when he prepares to cut off his legs rather than die helplessly.

evolutionMoments.description: Brogy declares Zoro shows the proof of a real warrior.

reveals.information: Would rather cut off his own legs than die helplessly, showing extreme warrior dedication

keyMoments.title: Immobilized by Candle Lock
keyMoments.description: Despite his immense strength as a giant warrior, Brogy is completely restrained by Mr. 3's hardened wax shackles.
keyMoments.significance: Demonstrates both the power of the Doru Doru no Mi and the dire situation the heroes face.

keyMoments.title: Learns of Mr. 3's Betrayal
keyMoments.description: Mr. 3 reveals that he manipulated Dorry's drink with explosives, tainting the giants' honorable century-old duel.
keyMoments.significance: Shows Baroque Works' dishonorable tactics and enrages Brogy despite his helplessness.

keyMoments.title: Recognizes Zoro's Warrior Spirit
keyMoments.description: Brogy expresses deep respect for Zoro's willingness to cut off his legs rather than die helplessly.
keyMoments.significance: Establishes the giants' recognition of true warriors regardless of size or allegiance.
keyMoments.quote: This is the proof of a real warrior!

relationships.description: Brogy recognizes Zoro as a true warrior when he prepares to sacrifice his legs.

evolutionMoments.description: Brogy declares Zoro's willingness to cut off his legs is proof of a real warrior.

reveals.information: His duel with Dorry was sabotaged by Mr. 3's explosive trick

keyMoments.title: Rescued by Karoo
keyMoments.description: Karoo digs Luffy out from the rubble where he was buried by Mr. 5's explosive attack, allowing him to continue fighting.
keyMoments.significance: Demonstrates the loyalty of Vivi's companion and enables Luffy to mount the rescue.

keyMoments.title: Arrives to Save His Crew
keyMoments.description: Luffy, along with Usopp and Karoo, arrives at Mr. 3's wax platform just in time to prevent Zoro from cutting off his legs.
keyMoments.significance: Classic heroic rescue timing that showcases Luffy's determination to save his friends.
keyMoments.quote: Don't worry! We're here to save you!

keyMoments.title: Trapped in the Wax Coating
keyMoments.description: Nami is slowly being encased in Mr. 3's wax along with Zoro and Vivi, facing imminent death as a living statue.
keyMoments.significance: Creates urgency and raises stakes for the rescue attempt.

keyMoments.title: Trapped in the Wax Coating
keyMoments.description: Vivi is slowly being encased in Mr. 3's wax along with Zoro and Nami, facing imminent death as a living statue.
keyMoments.significance: Creates urgency and raises stakes for the rescue attempt.

keyMoments.title: Arrives with Luffy to Save the Crew
keyMoments.description: Usopp arrives with Luffy and Karoo at the wax platform to rescue their trapped friends.
keyMoments.significance: Shows Usopp's bravery in facing Baroque Works agents to save his crewmates.

keyMoments.title: Rescues Luffy from Rubble
keyMoments.description: Karoo digs Luffy out from beneath the rubble where he was buried by Mr. 5's explosive attack.
keyMoments.significance: Demonstrates Karoo's loyalty and bravery, enabling the rescue mission to proceed.

keyMoments.title: Arrives at Wax Platform
keyMoments.description: Karoo accompanies Luffy and Usopp to the wax platform to save the trapped crew members.
keyMoments.significance: Shows Karoo as an active participant in the rescue effort.

reveals.information: Shows bravery and loyalty by rescuing Luffy and joining the dangerous rescue mission
